quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
name: Philip Green

quote: My family is my life, and everything else comes second as far as what's important to me.
name: Michael Imperioli

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
name: John Wooden

quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: The memories we make with our family is everything.
name: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
name: George Santayana

quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: You go through life wondering what is it all about but at the end of the day it's all about family.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
name: Richard Bach

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
name: George Burns

quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.
name: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quote: Holidays - any holiday - are such a great opportunity to focus on bringing the family together.
name: Lidia Bastianich

quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
name: David Ogden Stiers

quote: Cherish your human connections - your relationships with friends and family.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: Family always gonna be there. The material things, they come and go.
name: Romeo Miller

quote: I don't think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
name: Princess Diana

quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: I always believe holidays strengthen the family bond, away from our daily hectic schedules.
name: Chiranjeevi

quote: I absolutely love spending time with my family.
name: Kevin Alejandro

quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
name: Buddy Hackett

quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
name: Alex Haley

quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: The kitchen is the heart of every home, for the most part. It evokes memories of your family history.
name: Debi Mazar

quote: You need a really solid foundation of friends and family to keep you where you need to be.
name: Lilly Singh

quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: I'm a pretty uncomplicated person. I live a very simple life with my family and I enjoy very ordinary things.
name: Khaled Hosseini

quote: I always wanted to be a farmer. There is a tradition of that in my family.
name: Bjork

quote: I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.
name: Emma Roberts

quote: Everyone feels like family and I am back in the city that I love.
name: Chris Noth

quote: I love coming back home and seeing old friends and family. I would say it keeps me grounded.
name: Coy Bowles

quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
name: Walt Disney

quote: I've always been close to my family. I've got a lot of nieces and nephews, but I'm a good uncle.
name: John Waters

quote: I know all I really wanna do is get money and take care of my family.
name: Meek Mill

quote: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
name: Joseph Brodsky

quote: No family is complete without an embarrassing uncle.
name: Peter Morgan

quote: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family.
name: Coy Bowles

quote: Weekends are sacred for me. They're the perfect time to relax and spend time with family and friends.
name: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
name: Jennifer Ellison

quote: My advice: Take a second out of the day today and be thankful for your family.
name: Jenna Morasca

quote: We are very excited about welcoming a new member of the family, a daughter!
name: Michael Weatherly

quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: It was the dumbest thing I had ever seen, but it's a family thing, and I guess it's clean.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.
name: John Lasseter

quote: I always believe that the elders in my family are the reason for my success.
name: R. Madhavan

quote: I find that it's the simple things that remind you of family around the holidays.
name: Amy Adams

quote: I pretend I'm one of the royal family when I'm in a hotel and that the hotel belongs to me - it is a palace.
name: Martin Short

quote: My priority is to hang out with the ones I love - my family, my loved ones.
name: Cote de Pablo

quote: I will fight to the last breath, even though my family cowers in terror in the palace.
name: Ferdinand Marcos

quote: I am a family man, and my most important role is a father to my son.
name: Ed Skrein

quote: My grandfather did a lot of things in his life. What he was most proud of was raising his family.
name: Tagg Romney

quote: Rarely do members of the same family grow up under the same roof.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Food is everything. Food, friends, family: Those are the most important things in life.
name: Zac Posen

quote: We believed in our idea - a family park where parents and children could have fun- together.
name: Walt Disney

quote: I love my living room: it's the heart of my home where I get to chill and spend time with family and friends.
name: Bobby Berk

quote: Abortion is an attack on the family and the humanity that unites us all.
name: Alveda King

quote: Like family, we are tied to each other. This is what all good musicians understand.
name: Billy Joel

quote: And when I've been away from my family and friends, I have felt good hearing some of those old songs.
name: Beau Bridges

quote: I had a birthday party with my family and friends at a house, and Chipotle catered. It was beautiful.
name: Ansel Elgort

quote: I'm a minimalist. I don't really need much to enjoy a good holiday - just my family and the bare essentials.
name: Jean Reno

quote: The most important family value of all is time with your family.
name: Tom Perez

quote: My ultimate life dream project is my kids. My family.
name: Denzel Washington

quote: My Christmases have always just been very simple and about family.
name: Julie Roberts

quote: I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I'm very family-oriented.
name: Lil' Kim

quote: I love pizza. I want to marry it, but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding.
name: Mike Birbiglia

quote: What I miss the most is chatting with my friends and family and having a good laugh over a simple meal.
name: Kim Yuna

quote: My family is my little village. I really do feel like my fairy tale came true.
name: Molly Sims

quote: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live.
name: Pope John Paul II

quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
name: George Carlin

quote: I am fighting royalty. I have gypsy kings on both sides of the family.
name: Tyson Fury

quote: I have a good support system of friends and family.
name: Penny Marshall

quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: With all my fans I got a family again.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: Coming from a big family, I learned a lot. Things don't have to be perfect. You can do okay with 'almost.'
name: Hollis Stacy

quote: I lead a simple life. I get residuals. I have a family; we're doing alright.
name: Robert Morse

quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
name: Jet Li

quote: No one can find inner peace except by working, not in a self- centered way, but for the whole human family.
name: Peace Pilgrim

quote: The only relationships I wish to honour and keep are with my family and my dear loved ones.
name: Adnan Sami

quote: You can't have a happy family if you don't have a happy marriage.
name: Jeremy Sisto

quote: I would prefer to have no money but to have a nice family and good friends around.
name: Li Na

quote: I love Christmas. Christmas is family time.
name: Brody Jenner

quote: When you start about family, about lineage and ancestry, you are talking about every person on earth.
name: Alex Haley

quote: I love to cook, and I love to have all my family around the dinner table.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Actors are one family over the entire world.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I figure this is my time - to relax, be with my family and have a normal life.
name: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: It is important for me to carve out time in my schedule to spend quality time with my family.
name: Belinda Johnson

quote: When the peace treaty is signed, the war isn't over for the veterans, or the family. It's just starting.
name: Karl Marlantes

quote: Some of the most important conversations I've ever had occurred at my family's dinner table.
name: Bob Ehrlich

quote: All love comes from the family.
name: John Updike

quote: I need to make money for my family and my future family. I'm not a YOLO person.
name: Cardi B

quote: I'm a strong person, I'm a strong family man, I'm a strong husband and a strong father.
name: David Beckham

quote: I am just happy to be part of the Nike family.
name: LeBron James

quote: Real family values have gone down the drain in modern families.
name: Wes Borland

quote: My friends and family keep me grounded.
name: Gareth Bale

quote: My family barbecued a lot; good barbecue is more complicated than you think.
name: Manish Dayal

quote: Lectures should go from being like the family singing around the piano to high-quality concerts.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Being with my family is my highest priority.
name: Bethenny Frankel

quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Thank God I had all these family values or who knows where I'd be now.
name: Patricia Velasquez

quote: What is important is family, friends, giving back to your community and finding meaning in life.
name: Adrian Grenier

quote: I'm homesick all the time. I miss my animals. I miss my family. I miss my friends.
name: Brittany Howard

quote: I've got a really good family; I've got great friends around me.
name: Harry Styles

quote: Tennis just a game, family is forever.
name: Serena Williams

quote: My family values are really, really important.
name: Ayesha Curry

quote: I love hanging out with friends and family.
name: Ashley Wagner

quote: I am what I am. I love golf, I love my life, I love my family and friends.
name: Sergio Garcia

quote: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really.
name: Dhani Jones

quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
name: John Ruskin

quote: I'm not an anarchist, but I believe that people don't want the royal family - the so-called royal family.
name: Morrissey

quote: It means so much to me that my family went against our tradition for me.
name: Sonita Alizadeh

quote: Whatever else is unsure in this stinking dunghill of a world a mother's love is not.
name: James Joyce

quote: My family is everything. They love me unconditionally.
name: Sofia Carson

quote: A woman can plan when to have her family and how to support a family.
name: Kathleen Turner

quote: My perfect weekend is going for a walk with my family in the park. I don't think there's anything better.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: I'm lucky in that I have close friends and family and my agent to advise me.
name: Imogen Poots

quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Almost every time we get together with family or friends, the conversation ends up being about food.
name: Steve Chen

quote: Do not leave yourself or your family unprotected against financial storms... Build up savings.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: I feel only my friends and family need to know what is happening in my personal life.
name: Virat Kohli

quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
name: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: I think home has become my friends and family, wherever they are.
name: Rachel Brosnahan

quote: In modern life, we tend to forget family values because of the hectic schedule.
name: Mahesh Babu

quote: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: I like being with my family. That's my party.
name: Kevin Gates

quote: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family. We're all family - an extended family.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: I just love being around my family during the holidays.
name: Martha MacIsaac

quote: I'm very fortunate that I have a wonderful family around me and loved ones.
name: Melissa Etheridge

quote: My ancestors are Rajputs from Jaipur, a lineage of the royal family.
name: Kangana Ranaut

quote: I come from a family of fishermen. Fishing is very important to us. We don't hunt. We're not gun folk.
name: Nick Offerman

quote: All my life I thank God. My family was very religious.
name: Pele

quote: I think our family motto is to always work hard, be humble, kind, and thoughtful about others around us.
name: Anwar Hadid

quote: I've been so blessed to be part of a family that has dedicated its life to public service.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: For me, the most important things are me, myself, and my family.
name: Karishma Tanna

quote: Certainly part of being from a big family is that you have to shout to make yourself heard.
name: Rose Leslie

quote: I love my family, my wife, my kids, my dogs, my home, my life. I am a very happy and contented man.
name: Eric Idle

quote: Holidays are the best. I couldn't imagine being from a small family.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: If traditional marriage is not the law of the land, the institution of the family will cease to exist.
name: James Dobson

quote: I'm from a nice, suburban, middle-class family, but my tattoos remind me where I've been.
name: Tom Hardy

quote: I feel very lucky. My family and I have worked hard, and I feel very grateful.
name: Millie Bobby Brown

quote: The same way one tells a recipe, one tells a family history. Each one of us has our past locked inside.
name: Laura Esquivel

quote: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.
name: Grace Kelly

quote: This shared love of cooking and celebration has allowed me to create a strong bond with my family.
name: Camila Alves

quote: I grew up in a military family. My father spent 26 years in the Air Force.
name: Darryl Glenn

quote: A family needs to work as a team, supporting each other's individual aims and aspirations.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: It's kind of like I won a gold medal with my family.
name: Laurie Hernandez

quote: There's nothing like a family crisis, especially a divorce, to force a person to re-evaluate his life.
name: Michael Douglas

quote: I am not a person to compromise on my priorities and family just for a show.
name: Karishma Tanna

quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
name: Ralph Fiennes

quote: I'm very lucky to have a strong support system with my friends and my family. They have kept me grounded.
name: Kelsey Chow

quote: Baby eagles can never soar under their family's wing.
name: Liu Yang

quote: My dementia hasn't just affected me - it's affected my friends and family, too.
name: Gerry Anderson

quote: A person has got to balance work and life and family in order to be a balanced person.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Children are the keys of paradise.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: Nothing's really a prized possession except my family, you know?
name: James Hetfield

quote: The name Van Halen, the family legacy, is going to go on long after I'm gone.
name: Eddie Van Halen

quote: I think I'm funny because my family, my siblings were funny.
name: Martin Short

quote: I have always been the black sheep of the family. I am the middle child, with an older and a younger sister.
name: Fawad Khan

quote: The family is the school of duties - founded on love.
name: Felix Adler

quote: I have an amazing and supportive family. I'm fortunate to have a close relationship with everyone.
name: Jonathan Keltz

quote: I'm thankful to my family, friends, and fans for all of their support.
name: Serena Williams

quote: Having family responsibilities and concerns just has to make you a more understanding person.
name: Sandra Day O'Connor

quote: Truly successful lives are about family.
name: Elizabeth Warren

quote: I have lived in Mumbai for more than 20 years, have my domicile here, my home and family here.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: People think I hate the Royal Family, but that's not true.
name: John Lydon

quote: My family has always provided me unconditional love and support.
name: Jazz Jennings

quote: When I was a kid, our family used to watch 'Bonanza.' I really liked having a Sunday night TV ritual.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: I was the first in my family to go to college, and so, growing up, I thought that dressing well opened doors.
name: Joseph Abboud

quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
name: Will Durant

quote: The best advice I ever got as an organizer was that if you can organize your family, you're a good organizer.
name: Alicia Garza

quote: Little children are still the symbol of the eternal marriage between love and duty.
name: George Eliot

quote: A real hangover is nothing to try out family remedies on. The only cure for a real hangover is death.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: My whole family's been in the business. My whole family is crazy.
name: Blake Lively

quote: I'm terribly fastidious. I like symmetry and neatness, but my house is as chaotic as any other family's.
name: Kevin McCloud

quote: If your family loves you, you're fine. What you can't grow up without is love.
name: Joanna Lumley

quote: I don't design houses with the nuclear family idea because I don't believe in it as a concept.
name: Peter Eisenman

quote: I'm raising my family in The Church, and I'm proud of that.
name: Brandon Flowers

quote: I love being with my family, my friends, and my boyfriend.
name: Monica Keena

quote: Yet there are thousands of Indigenous people searching for family members.
name: Malcolm Fraser

quote: My family pride is something inconceivable. I can't help it. I was born sneering.
name: William Gilbert

quote: I like to spend Christmas with family and friends, pigging out, exchanging gifts and basically doing nothing.
name: George Kotsiopoulos

quote: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.
name: Christopher Love

quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
name: Bo Bennett

quote: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: I have friends and family that are filled with massive amounts of integrity. And it shouldn't be an oddity.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: As a general thing, when a woman wears the pants in a family, she has a good right to them.
name: Josh Billings

quote: A man ought to live so that everybody knows he is a Christian... and most of all, his family ought to know.
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Nothing separates a woman or a family from God's love. Not death, and certainly not divorce.
name: Glennon Doyle Melton

quote: My ideal travel companions are my family.
name: Pharrell Williams

quote: Family comes first. You're the only thing they have.
name: Heidi Klum

quote: Family, nature and health all go together.
name: Olivia Newton-John

quote: My kids give me the balance to live right.
name: Celine Dion

quote: I grew up in a family of people who were obsessed with fashion.
name: Michael Kors

quote: Growing up, I didn't just watch 'The Cosby Show.' I watched 'Growing Pains' and 'Family Ties,' too.
name: Lena Waithe

quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.
name: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: I am tortured when I am away from my family, from my children. I am horribly guilt-ridden.
name: Jessica Lange

quote: My family and my friends are most important to me. These people are my foundation.
name: Faith Hill

quote: I savour the adulation and love I have been getting from my fans and the blessings of elders in my family.
name: Akshay Kumar

quote: For me, cooking is very connected to my family and friends.
name: Trisha Yearwood

quote: I have a weird definition of family; it's not the same as everyone else's.
name: Lil Peep

quote: Certainly I would not risk a single life to restore the Kuwaiti royal family to the throne.
name: Terry Sanford

quote: My faith, my family, my friends - that's where I get my strength.
name: Dana Loesch

quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
name: John Oates

quote: I grew up playing music and enjoying good food, friends and family in my own backyard.
name: Rodney Atkins

quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
name: Guy Lafleur

quote: What must it be like for a little boy to read that daddy never loved mummy?
name: Princess Diana

quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
name: Amos Oz

quote: My family background was deeply Christian.
name: Abbe Pierre

quote: Luckily for me I have a very supportive family and a loving group of friends.
name: Andrew Rannells

quote: I love my family.
name: Manute Bol

quote: It is extraordinary that when you are acquainted with a whole family you can forget about them.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: I am the family face; flesh perishes, I live on.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: Dad kept us out of school, but school comes and goes. Family is forever.
name: Charlie Sheen

quote: I've always put my family first and that's just the way it is.
name: Jamie Lee Curtis

quote: All I really have in my life is my family and football. That's about it.
name: Jon Gruden

quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
name: Cary Grant

quote: I don't have to look up my family tree, because I know that I'm the sap.
name: Fred Allen

quote: I grew up in a big family with a lot of kids around, and I definitely want to have children as well.
name: Heidi Klum

quote: I would rather start a family than finish one.
name: Don Marquis

quote: I love cooking for myself and cooking for my family.
name: Al Roker

quote: When I'm ready, I plan to adopt. I still believe in family.
name: LaToya Jackson

quote: I was born into the most remarkable and eccentric family I could possibly have hoped for.
name: Maureen O'Hara

quote: I never did quite fit the glamour mode. It is life with my husband and family that is my high now.
name: Patty Duke

quote: At a certain point I'm going to want to have a family.
name: Gwen Stefani

quote: For me, nothing has ever taken precedence over being a mother and having a family and a home.
name: Jessica Lange

quote: My family comes first. Maybe that's what makes me different from other guys.
name: Bobby Darin

quote: I grew up in a family in which political issues were often discussed, and debated intensely.
name: Joseph Stiglitz

quote: The foundation of family - that's where it all begins for me.
name: Faith Hill

quote: Work is work, but family is for life. That's what really matters to me.
name: Akshay Kumar

quote: I don't know if I believe in marriage. I believe in family, love and children.
name: Penelope Cruz

quote: A woman can take care of the family. It takes a man to provide structure, to provide stability.
name: Tom DeLay

quote: I would love a family. I'm at the age where the wish for a child gets stronger. But who knows.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: Also, my mom and family are very important to me and I know that this is not expected.
name: Christina Milian

quote: When I remember my family, I always remember their backs. They were always indignantly leaving places.
name: John Cheever

quote: We went to church every Sunday. When I was a kid, the only time I sang was around my family.
name: Darius Rucker

quote: The family you come from isn't as important as the family you're going to have.
name: Ring Lardner

quote: The joke in our family is that we can cry reading the phone book.
name: Ron Reagan

quote: If we abandon marriage, we abandon the family.
name: Michael Enzi

quote: I've given it my all. I've done my best. Now, I'm ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives.
name: Richard M. Daley

quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
name: Anita Baker

quote: I love all my fam. I have quite possibly the best dad, mom, and sister in the world.
name: Ryan Eggold

quote: It's not that our family has no taste, it's just that our family's taste is inconsistent.
name: Dave Eggers

quote: I don't think anyone has a normal family.
name: Edward Furlong

quote: My family is more important than my party.
name: Zell Miller

quote: I realized my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house.
name: Anthony Anderson

quote: I have these visions of myself being thirty, thirty-five, forty having a family.
name: Nastassja Kinski

quote: If I had no family, my wife and I would lead a much more romantic and nomadic existence.
name: David McCallum

quote: I have a family to support. And I'm not always going to be doing exactly what I want to do.
name: Patrick Warburton

quote: I stay in tune with my family and God.
name: Regina King

quote: Dignity is not negotiable. Dignity is the honor of the family.
name: Vartan Gregorian

quote: Make a Goal Box, a chart of positive daily contact with a family when you are working with them.
name: Richard G. Scott

quote: The most difficult is the first family, to bring someone out of the world.
name: Richard G. Scott

quote: You have to defend your honor. And your family.
name: Suzanne Vega

quote: I live quietly at home among my family and friends.
name: Antonio Tabucchi

quote: Our family life was certainly not intellectual.
name: Douglass North

quote: I grew up in a very religious family. I could read the Qu'ran easily at the age of five.
name: Akhmad Kadyrov

quote: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
name: Julia Barr

quote: My family was my guide to my reality.
name: Haywood Nelson

quote: God did not intend the human family to be wafted to heaven on flowery beds of ease.
name: Frank Knox
